root.name: Urban Yeti!
root.description: Overview You can't go there Urban Yeti. That's a toll bridge. Urban Yeti! is a top down open world game for the Game Boy Advance. The game play is similar to Grand Theft Auto Advance, but the player controls a Yeti rather than a human gangster. However, the lack of a map or radar make navigating around the city a frustrating task. The storyline involves a Yeti that moves to the inner city to find a wife and start a family. The player can find a floating newspaper that allows the Yeti to work at one of four different jobs. Each job involves a different mini-game that play similarly to classic arcade games. For example, there is a Frisbee tournament that plays similarly to Discs of Tron.

similar_games.game: King Kong 2: Ikari no Megaton Punch
